REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0892 reute u f BC-ENGELHARD-CORP-<EC>-S 03-05 0044

TEXT.TITLE: ENGELHARD CORP <EC> SETS STOCK SPLIT
TEXT.BODY: Engelhard Corp said its board declared a three-for-two stock split and raised the quarterly dividend to 19-1/2 cts per share presplit from 19 cts, both payable March 31 to holders of record March 17. Reuter
